projects.title: Your Commission!
projects.description: Feel free to message me, @eliasvalk over on Discord for a commission!

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description:
The website you're currently visiting!
Originally made with React, but now the portfolio was remade (twice) with Svelte!
Old versions also included in the "Available at" section below.

projects.title: BULLETFEST
projects.description: A 2D Party game where you fight around with friends and strangers, with all kinds of strange weapons and items!

projects.title: BULLETFEST Bot
projects.description: a Discord bot serving as the back-end for the game "BULLETFEST"!

projects.title: Drive Bot
projects.description: A Commissioned Discord bot that acts like a Cloud Storage medium! Complete with a fully navigatable file system!

projects.title: Alphabot
projects.description:
An all-purpose Discord bot that I used to work on.
The project was abandoned due to problems with finding a proper server to host the bot, and Discord's many controversial API changes (such as practically forcing slash commands).

projects.title: D-Bugger
projects.description:
A project made for developers to log & keep track of bugs.
The project was shut down due to lack of funding and the low demand for it.

projects.title: Don't Feed the Hole
projects.description: A 2D Hypercasual game I made with a group of friends for a game-jam competition!

projects.title: Discord Emoji Bot
projects.description: A Discord bot made to "bypass" Discord's server limits on custom emojis!

projects.title: Image to ASCII art Converter
projects.description: This applications converts images to ASCII art. Originally made with Electron and later remade with Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) Forms.

projects.title: TCP Messaging App
projects.description: This project was just me fiddling around with networking, particularly the Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) in C#.
